@marty_walsh @CityOfBoston re: racism a public health crisis
You're a focking idiot stealing a govt paycheck.  Racism is a focking education issue moron.  COVID-19 doesn't have a focking thing to do with racism!!!!   Seriously?  You honestly cash your focking govt check with pride?
